52 typedef struct targetMotion_s
53 {
54  bool started;
55  double Vx, Vy, Vz;
56 
57  targetMotion_s()
58  {
59  started = false;
60  Vx = Vy = Vz = 0.0;
61  }
62 } TargetMotion;

72 class ParticleFilter
73 {
78  struct State
79  {
80  uint nRobots;
81  std::vector<bool> predicted;
82  std::vector<bool> measurementsDone;
83  bool robotsFused;
84  bool targetFused;
85  bool resampled;
86  bool calcVel;
87 
88  State(const uint numberRobots)
89  : nRobots(numberRobots), predicted(nRobots, false),
90  measurementsDone(nRobots, false)
91  {
92  reset();
93  }
94 
95  void reset()
96  {
97  predicted.assign(nRobots, false);
98  measurementsDone.assign(nRobots, false);
99  robotsFused = targetFused = resampled = calcVel = false;
100  }
101 
102  bool allPredicted()
103  {
104  return (std::find(predicted.begin(), predicted.end(), true) !=
105  predicted.end());
106  }
107 
108  bool allMeasurementsDone()
109  {
110  return (std::find(measurementsDone.begin(), measurementsDone.end(),
111  true) != measurementsDone.end());
112  }
113  };
